title: American Horror Story Apocalypse Michael Langdon Breaking News!!
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Cody Fern is going to be such a great Michael I feel like this may be the best season yet.

Calling it now. The witches will need Michaels twin baby sibling still in the house with Vivienne Harmon for some spell because Michael is half ghost half man they'll need the murder house to trap him or the ghost half of him to limit his power.
My theory is that Michael Langdon will some how cause the apocalypse and the witches will have to stop them

The title of the first 2 episodes have just been released!!!!! (edit-if you look up American Horror Story and go to episodes. episode 1 is called "The End" and episode 2 is called "The Morning After")
OMG!! This is such exciting news!!  He was such a CUTIE in "Versace"!!👍
